name: Concept/Mood Board game
description:
Prompt 8- A crazy platformer meant to be a challenge. Avoid a variety of hazards to reach your goal.

Working from this mood board was somewhat challenging as I couldn't see what the composer was going for, and the large color pallet was something I could not find a decent way to implement.

I assumed the theme was a sensual overload and a sense of exploration (due to the relatively large area shown and the Adventure Time character).

I would've liked to see a more obvious shared element in the reference images to show the intended theme.

Assuming I was right about the theme the colors helped to show that by making the aesthetic of the images very noisy, giving an "overload" feeling.
